title: Death Didn't Want Me... Now I Have Life
description: This book is about Borderline Personality Disorder. It is not written by doctors or professionals seeking to explain the ins and outs of this condition. The author, Hanna Dee, suffers from this disorder and during the up times and down times she has put her feelings into words.The content of this book is a straight from the heart, intense, no holds barred commentary on what it is like to suffer from Borderline Personality Disorder.It contains beautiful poetry, dark thoughts, love and hate. If you truly want to know what it's like to be under the control of this disorder, this book is a must read.
author: Hannah Dee
